settings.heading: General
settings.row_content:
Is Renart Decor legitimate?

Yes, Renart Decor is a 100% legitimate business, specializing in high-quality Neon LED signs that can be customized according to our customers' preferences. We are committed to delivering the perfect solutions, ensuring a secure and satisfying shopping experience. Our focus is on bringing personalized flair to your spaces with our bespoke Neon Sign products, alongside our dedication to customer satisfaction and service.

Why choose Renart Decor for neon signs?
We specialize in crafting high-quality neon signs that are not only vibrant and eye-catching but also tailored to meet your unique preferences and needs. Our signs are energy-efficient, durable, and made with meticulous attention to detail. Additionally, we pride ourselves on our responsive and helpful customer service team, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable shopping experience from start to finish. With Renart Decor, you're not just buying a neon sign; you're bringing a personalized piece of art into your space.

What is the difference between LED neon and glass neon?
Certainly! LED neon signs differ from traditional glass neon in several key ways. They are more durable and energy-efficient, making them a safer and more cost-effective choice. LED neon is made from flexible tubing that's less prone to breaking, easier to install, and requires minimal maintenance. Additionally, LED signs offer greater customization options and a longer lifespan compared to their glass counterparts. While both have their aesthetic appeal, the practical benefits of LED neon make it a popular choice for modern decor needs.

Do you have a warranty? What does the warranty include?
Yes, we offer 2-year warranty on our products. This warranty covers any defects in materials and workmanship. In the rare event that you encounter an issue with your product due to our manufacturing process, we will provide a replacement at no extra cost. Please visit our Warranty page for more details or feel free to reach out to u for your questions.

settings.heading: Shipping and Returns
settings.row_content:
What is the lead time for custom neon signs?

We need 2-3 business days to manufacture your custom neon sign and shipment usually takes another business days. You can expect to receive your sign at 4-6 business days in total.

What to do if there is a missing item in my package?
In case there is a missing item or a problem with your package, please contact us immediately and we’ll take care of the rest.

How do returns and exchanges work?

We have a very easy and convenient return and exchange process. Please visit our Returns & Exchanges page for more information on the next step. You can always contact us through email or phone if you need further help. Our dedicated customer service will do their best to help you.

What does the packaging include?

The packaging includes your made-to-order neon sign, power supply/adapter, complimentary dimmer, installation kit as well as the instruction guide on how to install your sign in a matter of minutes. To make things easier for you, we came up with the easiest installation process there is.

Can neon signs be shipped outside the US and Canada?

Yes, we ship worldwide with free express shipping. The shipping takes 2-3 business days for UK and Europe. For the rest of the world shipping time is 2-5 business days. Please note that there may be Customs and Duty fees at your home country which falls under buyer’s responsibility. Please check the Customs requirements for your country before placing your order.

settings.heading: Installation
settings.row_content:
How long is the cord for the neon signs?

The cord for our neon signs is 6 feet long. This length is designed to provide flexibility for placement and installation, ensuring you can easily connect your sign to a power source while accommodating various design layouts and preferences.

How can I clean my neon sign?

We include a cleaning guide in every package we ship but in case you lost it here is the cleaning process in a few easy steps. For mor information visit our cleaning guide page. 

To clean your neon sign, first ensure it is turned off and unplugged from the power source for safety. Gently wipe the surface with a soft, dry cloth to remove dust. If needed, you can slightly dampen the cloth with water, but avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners that could damage the sign. After wiping, if you've used a damp cloth, gently dry the sign with another soft, dry cloth. It's important to handle the sign gently during cleaning to prevent any bending or breaking of its parts. Regular, gentle cleaning will help maintain the sign's brightness and clarity, prolonging its lifespan.

What maintenance does neon signs require?

Neon signs from Renart Decor are designed for ease of maintenance. Regular dusting with a soft, dry cloth is generally all that's needed to keep your sign looking its best. It's important to handle the sign gently, especially when moving or adjusting it, to protect the neon tubing and electrical components. Ensure the sign is operated according to the instructions and connected to an appropriate power source. Avoid exposing the sign to moisture, as this can damage the electronics. Also, periodically inspect the power connections and cords for wear or damage, replacing them as necessary. With these simple care steps, your neon sign will continue to illuminate your space beautifully for years.

settings.heading: Technical
settings.row_content:
What are the backboard options for neon signs?

At Renart Decor, we offer 4 different backboard options. Cut to Shape and Cut to Letter are the most popular ones of these 4. We also offer Full Acryllic Board and Free Standing options to make sure you have exactly what you need. Our backboards come in 5 different color options: transparent, white, black, red and blue.

What are the available color options for neon signs?

Renart Decor offers 10 different colors for neon signs: white, warm white, yellow, orange, red, pink, purple, blue, green and ice blue. If you need a custom color feel free to reach out and we’ll see what we can do about it. Multi-color signs are also available at an extra cost.

What are neon signs made of?

Neon signs from Renart Decor are primarily made using LED technology. The "neon" part of the sign is crafted from flexible LED neon tubing, which is a durable and energy-efficient alternative to traditional glass neon. This tubing is made of materials that are both flexible and resilient, allowing for a wide range of custom shapes and designs. Inside the tubing, LED lights provide the bright, vibrant glow that mimics the classic neon look. The signs are often mounted on backboards, which can be made of various materials depending on the design and customer preference

How are neon signs powered?

Neon signs are mainly powered by electricity. They are designed to be plugged into a standard electrical outlet using a power adapter. The LED technology in these signs is highly energy-efficient, consuming significantly less power than traditional glass neon signs. We also offer a battery box at additional cost if you need to use your sign outdoors where no electric outlet is available. 

Can neon signs be used outdoors?

Our neon signs are made with our customer’s preference in mind. Our indoor neon signs are meant to be used indoor-only. They are not water-resistant but are durable enough if taken well care of in dry weathers. Our outdoor neon signs on the other hand are water resistant and will be more durable. However, please note that outdoor signs will still need to be taken well care of to prolong its life. Extensive exposure to sun or rain should be avoided.

settings.heading: Custom Orders
settings.row_content:
How do custom neon signs work?

It’s extremely easy! We have three different options for you:

  1. Design your own neon sign: Use our customizer to choose any font, color, size or text you’d like and we’ll create the neon sign of your dreams.
  2. Upload your design: You can share your artwork or logo with us so our in-house designers can turn them into a neon design. We’ll then share a free mock-up and provide a quote with you. Upon your confirmation, we’ll start working on your sign.
  3. Shop ready-made designs: Our in-house designers created hundreds of ready-made designs with our customers’ needs in mind. You can find everything from bar signs to motivational quote signs in our ready-made neon sign collections.

How can I design my own neon sign?

We’ve got you covered on this. Our customizer will provide you everything you need to come up with your dream sign. Visit our custom neon sign page and do as follows.

  1. Change the alignment of your text and type your text.
  2. Choose a font among our extensive font options. (For additional font options email us!)
  3. Choose your favorite color. We have 10 of the best colors for you at no extra cost. For multi-color or custom color options email us.
  4. Choose the size of your sign. Our customizer will show you the dimensions for convenience.
  5. Choose the type and the color of your backboard as well as the mounting type.
  6. State any additional requests and we’ll make it happen.

What fonts are available for custom neon signs?

We have 20+ fonts for you to choose from. If you have a particular font in mind feel free to email us and we’ll see if it’s doable.

Can I use my logo for a custom neon sign?

Sure thing. Visit our custom artwork neon sign page. Submit your logo or artwork along with other requested information. We’ll promptly provide you with a quote and a free mock-up so you can see how it’ll look like. Upon your confirmation you can complete your purchase.

How much does a custom neon sign cost?

Renart Decor offers the most competitive pricing on neon signs. We are a direct manufacturer, meaning we cut the middleman and can offer the best quality at a very affordable price point. You’ll be able to see the price of your custom neon sign beforehand. 

How can I get a quote for a custom neon sign with a logo?

Visit our custom artwork neon sign page. Submit your logo or artwork along with other requested information. We’ll promptly provide you with a quote and a free mock-up so you can see how it’ll look like. Upon your confirmation you can complete your purchase.

settings.text:
ABOUT HIT NEON®

Welcome to the Hit Neon® family! We're here to illuminate your world with the enchanting glow of neon lights. That's the essence of Hit Neon® – empowering you to fully customize your space. With a dedicated team of creative minds, we strive to deliver the finest neon signs imaginable. Our global reach ensures that every customer receives the gift of elegance. Hit Neon® isn't just about bespoke neon sign services; it's a concept that promises endless fun and creativity with LED neon sign supplies, allowing you to infuse your business, office or home decor with your unique imagination.

ILLUMINATE YOUR WORLD: A DAZZLING SELECTION OF NEON SIGNS

Discover our captivating array of neon signs, designed to command attention in various settings worldwide, from iconic landmarks and bustling businesses to cozy cafes and cherished homes. Explore our range, featuring tailored sidewalk signs, vibrant bar displays, personalized creations for weddings, businesses, and dining establishments, along with charming artworks to elevate any living space. Delve into our collection and uncover creative designs that will light up your days.

DESIGN YOUR OWN: CUSTOM LED NEON SIGNS

Step into a world where fun meets creativity and sophistication, where quality reigns supreme. Elevate every aspect of your life – from the comfort of your home to the bustling atmosphere of your business or the magic of a special event – with our dazzling LED signs. Let the vibrant glow of our creations light up every corner, casting a spell of joy and inspiration.Whether you're seeking a ready-made design crafted by our team of creative geniuses or yearning to infuse your personal touch, our options cater to every desire. Dive into our extensive collection of pre-designed masterpieces, each a testament to the artistry and skill of our in-house team. Or embark on a journey of customization, transforming your vision into reality with unique, one-of-a-kind creations.With our simple-to-design solutions and user-friendly approach, navigating this journey of light and wonder is a breeze. We believe that every step should be as enjoyable as the end result, so we've made sure that crafting your perfect LED sign is not only effortless but also a delightfully fun experience.And when it comes to hanging your masterpiece, simplicity is key. Our products come equipped with pre-drilled holes, ensuring quick and easy installation. No need for complicated setups or tedious processes – just effortless installation, allowing you to bask in the glow of your creation in no time.

YOUR NEON SIGNS PARTNER

Crafted from premium materials, our neon lights are delivered to your doorstep securely packaged, ensuring their pristine condition upon arrival. Engineered for durability, our products are built to last, all while offering the most competitive prices in the market.
Be the first one to hear about our new arrivals and special offers.
